channel.title: How do I install Kicksecure without installing or using anything Tor-related?
channel.description:
How do I install Kicksecure without installing or using anything Tor-related? Also, is it possible to skip the instalation of the various clients that get installed? Also, will Kicksecure affect my current UFW installation?
Thanks in advance! :smiley:
